nl.strohalm.cyclos.dao.accounts

Interface AccountDAO

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseDAO<Account>, DeletableDAO<Account>, InsertableDAO<Account>, UpdatableDAO<Account>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountDAOImpl

    public interface AccountDAO
extends BaseDAO<Account>, InsertableDAO<Account>, UpdatableDAO<Account>, DeletableDAO<Account>
    Interface DAO for accounts
    Author:
    rafael

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bulkUpdateCreditLimites(BulkUpdateAccountDTO dto)
      bulk updates all accounts specified in dto.group with the specified creditLimits.
      int countAccounts(MemberGroup group, MemberAccountType accountType, MemberAccount.Action activate)
      Returns the number of accounts with the given group, type and pending action
      TransactionSummaryVO getBrokerCommissions(GetTransactionsDTO params)
      Returns the broker commissions for the given account
      TransactionSummaryVO getCredits(GetTransactionsDTO params)
      Returns the credits for the given account
      TransactionSummaryVO getDebits(GetTransactionsDTO params)
      Returns the debits for the given account
      TransactionSummaryVO getLoans(GetTransactionsDTO params)
      Returns loans received for the given account
      MemberAccount getNextPendingProcessing()
      gets the first MemberAccount it can find with a non null action field.
      TransactionSummaryVO getPendingCredits(GetTransactionsDTO params)
      Returns the credits with status=PENDING for the given account
      TransactionSummaryVO getPendingDebits(GetTransactionsDTO params)
      Returns the debits with status=PENDING for the given account
      IteratorList<AccountDailyDifference> iterateDailyDifferences(MemberAccount account, Period period)
      Returns an iterator list with the differences of either balance or reserved amount for the given account, within the given period
      IteratorList<Account> iterateUnclosedAccounts(java.util.Calendar day, int maxResults)
      Iterates the next 'n' accounts which don't have a closed balance for the given day
      Account load(AccountOwner owner, AccountType type, Relationship... fetch)
      Loads an account using an owner and type, with the specified fetch
      java.util.List<Account> loadAll(java.util.List<AccountDTO> dtos, Relationship... fetch)
      Loads all the given accounts
      void markForActivation(BulkUpdateAccountDTO dto)
      creates member accounts in a bulk insert, and marks them for further activation.
      void markForDeactivation(MemberAccountType type, MemberGroup group)
      marks accounts for deactivation.
      java.util.Iterator<MemberTransactionDetailsReportData> membersTransactionsDetailsReport(MembersTransactionsReportParameters params)
      Returns data for the transaction details report
      java.util.Iterator<MemberTransactionSummaryVO> membersTransactionSummaryReport(java.util.Collection<MemberGroup> memberGroups, PaymentFilter paymentFilter, Period period, boolean credits, LocalSettings.MemberResultDisplay order)
      Iterates either credits or debits on the transaction summary report
      java.util.List<? extends Account> search(AccountQuery query)
      Searches for accounts, ordering by the type name.

      • markForActivation

        void markForActivation(BulkUpdateAccountDTO dto)
        creates member accounts in a bulk insert, and marks them for further activation. nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.accounts.MemberAccountHandler#ActivateAccountThread will handle this.

      • markForDeactivation

      • search

        java.util.List<? extends Account> search(AccountQuery query)
                                         throws DaoException
        Searches for accounts, ordering by the type name. If no entity can be found, returns an empty list. If any exception is thrown by the underlying implementation, it should be wrapped by a DaoException.
        Throws:
        DaoException - General error
